name: Scott Adams Scoops
overview: A U.S. Gold Master Games label compilation of 4 games originally released as individual titles by Adventure International. All 4 games are single player text adventures. Buckaroo Banzai (aka The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai across the 8th Dimension): by Phillip Case, Kem McNair and Scott Adams. It was converted to the BBC Micro by Brian Howart and originally released in 1987. Fifteenth game in the Scott Adams Adventure series. Pirate Adventure: by Scott and Alexis Adams. It was converted to the BBC Micro by Brian Howart and Cliff Ogden and originally released in 1984. Second game in the Scott Adams Adventure series. Strange Odyssey: by Scott Adams. Two BBC Micro conversions were made; one by Mak Jukic and another by Brian Howart and Cliff Ogden, with both originally released in 1984. Sixth game in the Scott Adams Adventure series. Voodoo Castle: by Scott and Alexis Adams. It was converted to the BBC Micro by Brian Howart and Cliff Ogden and originally released in 1984. Fourth game in the Scott Adams Adventure series.
